titles.title: A resolution urging the member nations of the United Nations Commission on Human Rights to support a resolution on human rights in Cuba.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 3/4/1993--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Senate that the member nations of the United Nations Commission on Human Rights should cosponsor and vote for the resolution reappointing the Special Rapporteur on Cuba and calling on the Cuban Government to abide by internationally recognized standards on human rights.
